Class Ballot

java.lang.Object
  Ballot
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Ballot
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class encapsulates all information pertaining to a particular topic. Each instance of the class will contain all data associated with a particular topic.

See Also:
Serialized Form
